### **Person** {data-width=200}

```{r}
inputPanel(
    selectInput(
        "personSelect",
        "Select a Family Member",
        choices = person$standings$Person
    )
)
```

### **Standings**

```{r}
output$personStandings <- renderText({
    x <- filter(person$standings, Person == input$personSelect)
    sprintf(
        fmt = "%s place: %s",
        x$Place,
        x$Record
    )
})
textOutput("personStandings")
```
